    heretic

    "one who differs in opinion from an accepted belief or doctrine"

    Merriam-Webster
    nonconformist

    "a person who does not conform to a generally accepted pattern of thought or action"

    Merriam-Webster
    iconoclast

    "a person who attacks settled beliefs or institutions"
